name: Alexander Karelas's Homepage
body:
### Work
I program for various companies in Perl, MySQL, JavaScript and also a small bit of HTML & CSS.

### Personal traits
After 13 years of writing Perl, the code I write now is well-tested, tidy, easy-to-read, and concise. I write in [Modern Perl](http://www.modernperlbooks.com/mt/index.html).

### Personal projects
In my spare time, I like to work on my own projects. KJabberd, XML::MyXML and I have a couple more that have not been released yet. I have begun to use AngularJS a lot.

### KJabberd
[KJabberd](https://github.com/akarelas/KJabberd) is a simple Jabber server (written in Perl), especially designed to be integrated with websites. It's new and under development, but functional already.

### XML::MyXML
[XML::MyXML](https://metacpan.org/module/XML::MyXML::II) is a nice and easy Perl module, for parsing and creating XML documents.

### Favourite Perl Modules
[Mojolicious](http://mojolicio.us/), [Moo](https://metacpan.org/pod/Moo), [AnyEvent](https://metacpan.org/pod/AnyEvent)

### Favourite JavaScript Libraries
[AngularJS](http://angularjs.org/), [Moment.js](http://momentjs.com/), [Lo-Dash](http://lodash.com/)

### Bugs I've found and/or fixed
Here's a [list of bugs](/bugs.html) that I've found and/or provided a fix for since 2013.
